title: Raisin Mechanic with Rasen Mechanic

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Fix someone's raisins each night, purging all negative effects from them and giving them a 50% chance to survive Basic attacks against them tonight. They are also immune to all negative effects, including any tier of attack, from Rasen tonight.
- **Timewarp** during the day. (*Choose a previous night's actions and rewrite their targets. Everything is reprocessed from that point, so players who were rewritten to die have their later actions undone, but new feedback isn't given. Timewarping resolves at day end and is announced. You may only timewarp once.*)
